QAPair.Question: What is (are) Understanding your colon cancer risk ?
QAPair.Answer: Colorectal cancer risk factors are things that increase the chance that you could get colorectal cancer. Some risk factors you can control, such as drinking alcohol, diet, and being overweight. Others, such as family history, you cannot control. The more risk factors you have, the more your risk increases. But it does not mean you will get cancer. Many people with risk factors never get cancer. Other people get colorectal cancer but do not have any known risk factors. Learn about your risk and what steps you can take to prevent colorectal cancer .
